QuestData.Title: Weapons of War
QuestData.Description: What I'm about to ask of you isn't going to be easy to accomplish, $n. Keeshan left everything back there in that orc prison, and I'm not just talking about his soul or his will to live.$B$BIf we're going to get Johnny ready for war, we need to recover his prized possessions. The orcs now hold Keeshan's bow and his survival knife.$B$BHead to Alther's Mill, east of here and look for two orc lieutenants, Murdunk and Homurk. They've got Keeshan's gear. Get it back.$B$BI'll be in touch via gnomecorder.
QuestData.PortraitTurnInText: You send that many, don't forget one thing. A good supply of body bags.
QuestData.LogDescription: Recover Keeshan's Bow and Keeshan's Survival Knife.
QuestData.CompletionText: Did you terminate Murdunk and Homurk?
QuestData.RewardText: <The gnomecorder buzzes with energy.>$B$BCome in, $n. Do you copy? Troteman here! Great job on getting Keeshan's weapons back! Now there's one final mission you have to run. Are you up to the challenge?
